text: Edvard Evers (born May 12, 1853 in Uddevalla, Sweden, died October 22, 1919 in Stockholm) was a Swedish hymn writer and priest. He is best known for writing the lyrics for the Christmas song Jul, jul, str√•lande jul. ==References== Category:1853 births Category:1919 deaths Category:Swedish writers
title: Edvard Evers
